name: 3LEVELS
description:
This is an open-source godot-project that you can find over at:
https://github.com/greenpixels/3Levels 3LEVELS - Made with Godot Gameplay

The lower levels of the mines aren't safe anymore. Escape the three short levels of the mine as fast as possible. You control your character with the arrow keys and can climb walls by jumping against them. The goal is to reach the end of the third level.

Highscores

If you want to add your time to the highscore-list, then please post a video of your run in the comments.

Controls

Arrow-Left : Run Left
Arrow-Right: Run Right
Arrow-Up: Jump

Arrow-Up while against a wall: Wall Jump
